snippet: The government is aiming to draw students to study the ideology of Marx, Lenin and Ho Chi Minh, but the students are avoiding those programs because they say potential employers are not interested.
abstract: Vietnam's Communist government is aiming to draw students to study socialist ideology of Marx, Lenin and Ho Chi Minh by offering free tuition to attract students; students have been shunning such degrees because potential employers are not interested in those programs.
lead_paragraph: The government is aiming to draw students to study the ideology of Marx, Lenin and Ho Chi Minh, but the students are avoiding those programs because they say potential employers are not interested.

headline.main: Vietnam Seeks to Lure Students to Study Marxism With Free Tuition
headline.print_headline: Vietnam Sets Price to Study Marxism at $0
